Text:
DAMAN whats up with new anime being released this week such AS BODACIOUS SPACE PIRATES, and Legend of heroes complete collection. Also when will you have Blood c which is stated for a jan 22nd release but you usually get your releases out earlier then the shops do. 
Also baka an test season 2 on the 15th.
And penguin drum collection on new years.
Also when will you be releasing KAMISAMA dolls?
Tiger and bunny, and shana ova and movie. I dunno if you did the series or not.
Also battle girls time paradox i think thats for a late feb release though.

ill have those up when i can, im currently finishing up Elfen lied and Cowboy Bebop blu rays.

As for Shana, hmm ive had the blu rays for about 2weeks now but the english Dubs are so bad+ quality of the blu rays are horrible it makes me not want to even bother doing it.
Do you know of a program that'll convert these so they can be burned to dvd? Or at least a mp4?
yeah im really looking forward for most of the shows stated on your like moose especially bodasius space pirates.Ive seen the trailer it was so so

shana wasnt THAT bad i liked the audio. I honestly could not tell the differance from regular or blu ray though. It would me much apreciated i seen the first season a WHILE ago but the new one is good people said.
Just seen more trailers for kamisama dolls. Its NOTHING what the title seems. It looks dark and wild and crazy. Looks so good i seen a couple amv's for it and looked so good.
To anyone wanting to watch this movie in Japanese with subs, the subtitles are 7.2 seconds slow. So, if you're watching in VLC, use the "G" key to delay the subtitles by -7200 ms.
